trans-unit.source: Represents controls that initiate or perform a single, unambiguous action and do not maintain state when activated.
trans-unit.target: Representerar kontroller som initierar eller utföra en enda, entydigt åtgärd och inte underhåller tillstånd när aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: Controls support InvokePattern if the same behavior is not exposed through another control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller stöder InvokePattern om samma beteende inte exponeras via en annan kontroll mönster.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A> method on a control performs the same action as the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> method, the control will not support InvokePattern.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>metoden för en kontroll utför samma åtgärd som den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A>metoden kontrollen stöder inte InvokePattern.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that represent controls such as check boxes and radio buttons, which maintain a state, instead support <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]i stället stöd <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern>eller <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern> för element som representerar kontroller, till exempel kryssrutor och alternativknappar, som bibehåller tillståndet

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: Skickar en begäran att aktivera en kontroll och starta den enda, entydigt åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: Calls to Invoke should return immediately without blocking.
trans-unit.target: Anrop till Invoke ska returnera omedelbart utan att blockera.

trans-unit.source: However, this behavior is entirely dependent on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: Det här beteendet är dock helt beroende av den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] providerns implementering.

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where calling Invoke causes a blocking issue (such as a modal dialog) a separate helper thread may be required to call the method.
trans-unit.target: I scenarier där anropa Invoke orsakar ett blockeringsfel (till exempel en spärrad dialogruta) en separat hjälp kan tråd behöva anropa metoden.

trans-unit.source: The element does not support the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern"></xref> control pattern or is hidden or blocked.
trans-unit.target: Elementet stöder inte den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern"> </xref> styra mönstret är dold eller blockeras.

trans-unit.source: The element is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Elementet är inte aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: Can be raised when a UI Automation provider has implemented its own handling of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsEnabled*> property.
trans-unit.target: Kan aktiveras när en UI Automation-provider har genomfört sin egen hantering av den <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsEnabled*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationElementInformation.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when a control is invoked or activated.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den händelse som aktiveras när en kontroll anropas eller aktiveras.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Den här identifieraren används av UI Automation-klientprogram.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: En UI Automation providers ska använda det motsvarande fältet i <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The InvokedEvent identifier is passed as a parameter to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för InvokedEvent skickas som en parameter till <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern"> </xref> kontroll mönster.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Den här identifieraren används av UI Automation-klientprogram.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: En UI Automation providers ska använda det motsvarande fältet i <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för mönster skickas till metoder som till exempel <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>att hämta mönstret kontroll av intresse från den angivna <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
